reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The vision of our project is to contribute to the implementation of the SDGs in Tanzania so that the processes through which they are coordinated are transparent inclusive and benefit from strong civil society participation. UNA Tanzania and Tanzania Natio nal CSO Platform on Sustainable Development work as the main channels of implementation for national and local level policy and advocacy work in Tanzania and the various project partners from private sector to grassroot level organizations bring in their v aluable knowledge on the contents and methods to be used in a truly multi-stakeholder manner.

The vision of our project is to contribute to the implementation of the SDGs in Tanzania so that the processes through which they are coordinated are transparent inclusive and benefit from strong civil society participation. UNA Tanzania and Tanzania Natio nal CSO Platform on Sustainable Development work as the main channels of implementation for national and local level policy and advocacy work in Tanzania and the various project partners from private sector to grassroot level organizations bring in their v aluable knowledge on the contents and methods to be used in a truly multi-stakeholder manner.

tag.narrative: Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
